remarks: Lemma for ~ mhmmnd and ~ ghmgrp .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Apr-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2014.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2020.)
statement:
ghmgrp.f $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X /\ y e. X ) -> ( F ` ( x .+ y ) ) = ( ( F ` x ) .+^ ( F ` y ) ) ) $.
mhmlem.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. X ) $.
mhmlem.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. X ) $.
mhmlem $p |- ( ph -> ( F ` ( A .+ B ) ) = ( ( F ` A ) .+^ ( F ` B ) ) ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d .+^ x y $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d F x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d ph x y $.
